name: AMR-Url_Uploader
description: An url uploader bot with permenent thumbnail support

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

AUTH_USERS.description: allow only pre-defined users to use this bot

UPDATE_CHANNEL.description: For Force Subscribe. Paste your Update channel USERNAME (without @)..

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Logs Channel ID for some Tracking XD. Example: -100123456789

DEF_THUMB_NAIL_VID_S.description: default thumbnail to be used in the videos. Incase, youtube-dl is unable to find a thumbnail.

DOWNLOAD_PATH.description: Files download path. You can keep default. Should not end with '/'

SLEEP_TIME.description: Time Gap Between Process. Keep Default.

BROADCAST_AS_COPY.description: Broadcast as Copy or with Forward Tag. Value should be True/False.
